downloadTitle: HttpClient. Background Transfer, and Sockets Network API Poster for Windows Runtime Developers
downloadDescription: Windows runtime developers!  This Network API poster describes some of the most popular Network APIs in the Windows Runtime classes.  The set of posters includes HttpClient, Background Transfer, and Sockets
detailsSection:
Windows runtime developers!  This Network API poster describes some of the most popular Network APIs in the Windows Runtime classes.  The set of posters includes HttpClient, Background Transfer, and Sockets.

The poster is provided in PDF format. When you print it from the PDF, specify the dimensions as landscape Tabloid size (11 inches by 17 inches).
systemRequirementsSection: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows Server 2008, Windows Vista, Windows XP.  You will also need a PDF file reader; the poster in this download is provided as a PDF file.
installInstructionSection: Download the PDF, and then view it with a PDF reader or print it.
